article_metadata.description: With 2016 underway, it's time for my annual predictions post covering everything from the U.S. economy to elections to the Oscars. It could be a bumpy year for the stock market and some billion-dollar unicorns, but the dollar and drones should have a big 2016. Oh, and the White House likely will find itself with familiar residents.
article_metadata.author: Mark Rogowsky
